author: VoxSapientiae
text: Danger: Drinking and feeling a little pervie tonight.

author: VoxSapientiae
text:
"I've cheated 3x and run around flirting with someone else for months, but I never want to hurt you"

Is she fucking serious? How could anyone be THAT lacking in self awareness or situational awareness?

author: VoxSapientiae
text: You leak the draft to force them to circle the wagons https://t.co/7TWkND63wV

author: VoxSapientiae
text: Exactly. I frankly suspect that Alito himself likely leaked it to force the conservative justices to circle their wagons. https://t.co/LbtZdqbwtJ

author: VoxSapientiae
text:
Dear John Roberts:

Fuck SCOTUS's right to privacy until SCOTUS respects the privacy rights of *every* American.

author: VoxSapientiae
text:
I've said it before: Samuel Alito is just too stupid to sit on SCOTUS. 

He was tragically wrong on Citizens United
He is tragically wrong on Roe, Casey, & Griswold

We must expand SCOTUS

author: VoxSapientiae
text: I do NOT advocate violence, but I do wonder what would happen if worshippers entering anti-abortion churches felt the same level of pressure as patients entering a Planned Parenthood clinic?  If anti-abortion clergy faced the same level of public outcry as healthcare providers?

author: VoxSapientiae
text:
It wasn't a wrong bet @SenatorCollins. You are simply tragically inadequate as a Senator. The entire country, Democrats and Republicans, knew how Kavanaugh would vote. Somehow in a Seante that includes @TedCruz, YOU may be the Senate's village idiot.

https://t.co/Li7ljYGkZj

author: VoxSapientiae
text:
NO EXCEPTIONS
Not for rape
Not for incest
Not for medical emergencies

If you are female, if you have a daughter or granddaughter, or daughter-in-law, if you ever aspire to have a lifelong relationship with a woman, this November you will LITERALLY be voting for their lives https://t.co/0eJznHy99S

author: VoxSapientiae
text:
Why leak the opinion?

Could it have anything to do with the idea that Clarence wasn't the only SCOTUS justice that helped Ginni?

author: VoxSapientiae
text:
A weird thought...
While everyone is worrying about WW3, as Poland, a NATO member wades into the fray...

Would anyone remember the names of 5 conservative assholes in black bathrobes who disappeared overnight? https://t.co/wMAjE4JKFh

author: VoxSapientiae
text:
Poland...
A NATO member...
This just got interesting... https://t.co/wMAjE4JKFh

author: VoxSapientiae
text: How about freaking out over the idea that for the first time in the history of our country five assholes have revoked a Constitutional Right over partisan political beliefs and personal religious beliefs? https://t.co/36SpcNJfwD

author: VoxSapientiae
text: To the 55% of white women who still supported Republicans in 2020... tonight you are reaping the bitter harvest you have sown

author: VoxSapientiae
text:
And I'd like to add a hearty "Fuck You" to everyone who didn't vote AGAINST Trump by casting a ballot for HRC.

The 2016 election had consequences and if you didn't vote for HRC, YOU ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR THEM. https://t.co/p2y5QdnSAe

text: (OBVIOUSLY a metaphor...)

text: Would I land myself in Twitter jail by paraphrasing Ronald Reagan by saying that I'd like a Republican Party that's small enough to drown in the bathtub?

text:

Texas too

text: I get that the stupid half of all white males vote GOP because it's their only hope for staying on top of the heap... But I just can't fathom why anyone else would.

author: VoxSapientiae
text:
Can I just say a hearty "FUCK YOU" to every Bernie-Bro that though mainstream Dems like HRC and JRB were no different from the GOP?

Wise up: If you want progress, vote for the candidate most likely to defeat the Republican. https://t.co/qfSAd2dDiT

author: VoxSapientiae
text: You have no fucking clue what the GOP's partisan hacks just unleashed... https://t.co/24LVuHxya9

author: VoxSapientiae
text: And this poll was taken before Republican partisan hacks revoked you right to privacy (which BTW, was based on Roe v Wade) https://t.co/OON1mpWaj6

author: VoxSapientiae
text:
I'm trying to think of a case prior to now in which America LOST a Constitutional right.

What right will the GOP eliminate next?

author: VoxSapientiae
text: Did you know that the Constitution doesn't mention a "right to privacy"?  What we had for a right to privacy was based on Roe v Wade.

author: VoxSapientiae
text:
The word VACCINE also doesn't appear in the Constitution...

Let's make them mandatory... death penalty for avoiding  them based on the reckless endangerment of 330million other lives

author: VoxSapientiae
text:
GOP to American Women: "Shush. Put on your red cloak and get knocked up. Your only value is squirting out babies."

Wondering how women and anyone under 40 will respond... https://t.co/1W7MzRARBv

author: VoxSapientiae
text:
Well, Women of America?

Still think there's little difference between our political parties?  Still think the GOP might offer you something besides a red cloak?

author: VoxSapientiae
text:
I think we need a new law...

Make it illegal for one person to own more than 0.5% of any media company that claims to reach more than 10 million people.

text:
Tonight, you need to hear it:

I love you all

Share the love
